TopicTitle: Hello. Awesome game you have here.

Articles.Content: Hi, I\'ve been playing more or less continuously for 2 days now, it\'s ridiculously addictive. Good fun though . I canâ€™t wait for the missions and things to be added. Is there a list of intended future features, or is it more made up as the development goes on?

Welcome to the Forum!

There\'s a list of planned features here, although it\'s a bit outdated-the best way to gauge the ways are going to end up is probably to keep an eye on the development section.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Capt\'n Skunky
Thanks for that, not sure how I missed that entire sub forum, clearly I wasn\'t paying enough attention.
